thread.title: Great stay near airport
thread.title_full: Great stay near airport - Review of Hilton Garden Inn San Francisco Airport North, South San Francisco, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Amy F
title: Great stay near airport
text: We arrived prior to the check in time (by an hour). They had a room available. The room and bathroom were spotless. The staff was helpful and recommended food choices that were close to the hotel. They also had a food pantry. If you didn't feel like leaving the hotel you could purchase frozen food items to cook in the microwave in your room. This is very convenient if you are exhausted and don't want to go back out at night. I have no complaints with this hotel!
